column4: anyone knows how I could increase that timeout of wpa_supplicant: Authentication with 00:18:39:ab:30:96 timed out. ?
are sure wpa_supplicant is using the right driver? (option -D ...)
why are you guys never answering the questions? Yes I'm using the correct driver
because the timeout could be caused by wpa_supplicant using the wrong driver method (i.e. wext instead of madwifi when talking to a madwifi-based card)
i looked into the manpage of wpa_supplicant.conf and there is no timeout value..
also there seems to be no commandline option for it
I know I couldn't find it either
which wireless card/driver do you use anyway?
so the bcm43xx driver is still not usable? too bad
i avoid broadcom cards, so i have little experience with bcm43xx
at least not that one shipped with ubuntu
you know the ndiswrapper works perfect except the authentification...
if you cannot answer me in the query, please join #POVhelp
no I don't want to (can't send private...
